pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api
Interface BristlebackConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
BristleConfig
public interface BristlebackConfig

Bristleback Server configuration, containing all basic server components. Bristleback configuration should be only used by server internals and components creators.

Created on: 2012-01-23 19:55:22

Author:
Wojciech Niemiec
